verbs.description: regional leaders [V: are] defying afghanistan president the latest is a police chief who was once a close u s ally abdul raziq a onetime u s ally accused of human rights abuses said president ashraf ghani can not fire me from his perch as police chief in kandahar burhanuddin rabbani afghanistan hamid karzai raziq mohammed omar ghani taliban noor kandahar abdul rashid dostum
